manifest.name: AI Assistant
manifest.description:
Contentstack Marketplace lets you integrate the AI Assistant app to quickly and easily create summaries, outlines, metadata tags and descriptions, headlines, even full-length keyword-optimized blogs all with just a few clicks.

You can choose to generate, regenerate and replace content for the current field. Also, generate content for an entry field based on another field. You can also provide a custom command to manipulate the data based on your instructions.

With the Contentstack Entry Field UI location, you can access the AI Assistant app in different entry field types such as Title, Single Line Textbox, Multi-Line Textbox, HTML-based Rich Text Editor, JSON Rich Text Editor and Markdown.

meta.name: AI Assistant
meta.description: The JsonRTE Field plugin location allows you to use AI Assistant on selected content.

meta.name: AI Assistant
meta.description: Entry Field UI location allows you to enable the AI Assistant app in different field types.
